template<class Item>
void AbstractMenuListModel< Item >::AddItem (  Item *  item  )  [inline]
 

template<class Item>
void AbstractMenuListModel< Item >::AddItem (  Item *  item,
Item *  after
) 
 

Adds the item item into the menu-list. By default the item is appended to the end of the menu-list. If you want to insert the item after an other item, hand over this item in item.

INT  selected_index

Obsolete - selected index is ignored. Use AbstractListBox::SetSelectedIndex() instead.
